column4: how can i make software center refresh after i add a new source? i just added libreoffice ppa but the packages aren't showing up
don't know with GUI, but in a terminal type sudo apt-get update
use the une remix ( ubuntu netbook remix )
I had some problems with panes in the une edition because aplets are locked, deinstalling ubuntu-netbook-default-settings, that leads to the problem that you have to start your Session manually
